list.abs: 羚羊角(ANTELOPE HORN)1.概述:羚羊角又称羚羊角尖。目前药用羚羊角系指牛科动物赛加羚羊的角,形状呈长圆锥状,略呈弓形弯曲,长为15～33cm,黄白色或黄灰色,老角.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (originally the name of a fierce mythical creature with long serrated horns, said to live on the banks of the Euphrates): via Old French and medieval Latin from late Greek antholops, of unknown origin and meaning

entry.def: Anantelope is an animal like a deer, with long legs and horns, that lives in Africa or Asia. Antelopes are graceful and can run fast. There are many different types of antelope.

means.word_mean: 1. graceful Old World ruminant with long legs and horns directed upward and backward; includes gazelles; springboks; impalas; addax; gerenuks; blackbucks; dik-diks
